Files

gotham_formdata_derive/form_data/
mod.rs

1use crate::util::*;
2use proc_macro2::{Span, TokenStream};
3use std::iter;
4use syn::{
5	AngleBracketedGenericArguments, BoundLifetimes, Data, DeriveInput, Error, Fields,
6	GenericArgument, GenericParam, Lifetime, LifetimeParam, PathArguments, PredicateType,
7	Result, TraitBound, TraitBoundModifier, Type, TypeParamBound, TypePath, WhereClause,
8	WherePredicate
9};
10use syn_path::path;
11
12mod builder;
13use builder::FormDataBuilder;
14
15mod field;
16use field::Field;
17
18pub(super) fn expand(input: DeriveInput) -> Result<TokenStream> {
19	let name = &input.ident;
20
21	let (impl_generics, ty_generics, where_clause) = input.generics.split_for_impl();
22	let mut where_clause = where_clause.cloned().unwrap_or_else(|| WhereClause {
23		where_token: Default::default(),
24		predicates: Default::default()
25	});
26
27	let strukt = match input.data {
28		Data::Struct(strukt) => strukt,
29		_ => {
30			return Err(Error::new(
31				Span::call_site(),
32				"#[derive(FormData)] can only be used on structs"
33			))
34		},
35	};
36
37	let fields = match strukt.fields {
38		Fields::Named(named) => named
39			.named
40			.into_iter()
41			.map(Field::new)
42			.collect_to_result()?,
43		Fields::Unnamed(_) => {
44			return Err(Error::new(
45				Span::call_site(),
46				"#[derive(FormData)] cannot be used on tuple structs"
47			))
48		},
49		Fields::Unit => Vec::new()
50	};
51
52	for f in &fields {
53		// T: Send
54		where_clause
55			.predicates
56			.push(where_predicate_t_send(f.ty.clone()));
57
58		// for<'a> Value<'a>: Parse<T>
59		where_clause
60			.predicates
61			.push(where_predicate_value_parse_t(f.ty.clone()));
62	}
63
64	let builder = FormDataBuilder {
65		name,
66		ident: format_ident!("{}FormDataBuilder", name),
67		impl_generics: &impl_generics,
68		ty_generics: &ty_generics,
69		where_clause: &where_clause,
70		fields: &fields
71	};
72	let builder_ident = &builder.ident;
73
74	let builder_struct = builder.gen_struct();
75	let builder_default_impl = builder.gen_default_impl();
76	let builder_builder_impl = builder.gen_builder_impl();
77
78	let mut dummy = format_ident!("_IMPL_FORMDATA_FOR_{}", name);
79	dummy.set_span(Span::call_site());
80	Ok(quote! {
81		#[allow(non_upper_case_globals)]
82		static #dummy: () = {
83			#builder_struct
84			#builder_default_impl
85			#builder_builder_impl
86
87			impl #impl_generics ::gotham_formdata::FormData for #name #ty_generics
88			#where_clause
89			{
90				type Err = ::gotham_formdata::Error;
91
92				fn parse_form_data(state: &mut ::gotham_formdata::private::State) -> ::gotham_formdata::FormDataFuture<Self> {
93					use ::gotham_formdata::private::FutureExt as _;
94
95					let content_type = ::gotham_formdata::private::get_content_type(state);
96					let body = ::gotham_formdata::private::get_body(state);
97
98					async move {
99						let content_type = content_type?;
100						::gotham_formdata::private::debug!("Parsing Form Data for type {} with Content-Type {}", stringify!(#name), content_type);
101
102						let res = ::gotham_formdata::private::parse::<#builder_ident #ty_generics>(body, content_type).await?;
103						::gotham_formdata::private::Validate::validate(&res)?;
104						Ok(res)
105					}.boxed()
106				}
107			}
108		};
109	})
110}
111
112/// `T: Send`
113fn where_predicate_t_send(t: Type) -> WherePredicate {
114	WherePredicate::Type(PredicateType {
115		lifetimes: None,
116		bounded_ty: t,
117		colon_token: Default::default(),
118		bounds: iter::once(TypeParamBound::Trait(TraitBound {
119			paren_token: None,
120			modifier: TraitBoundModifier::None,
121			lifetimes: None,
122			path: path!(::std::marker::Send)
123		}))
124		.collect()
125	})
126}
127
128/// `for<'a> Value<'a>: Parse<T>`
129fn where_predicate_value_parse_t(t: Type) -> WherePredicate {
130	let lt = Lifetime {
131		apostrophe: Span::call_site(),
132		ident: format_ident!("gotham_formdata_value")
133	};
134	WherePredicate::Type(PredicateType {
135		lifetimes: Some(BoundLifetimes {
136			for_token: Default::default(),
137			lt_token: Default::default(),
138			lifetimes: iter::once(GenericParam::Lifetime(LifetimeParam {
139				attrs: Vec::new(),
140				lifetime: lt.clone(),
141				colon_token: None,
142				bounds: Default::default()
143			}))
144			.collect(),
145			gt_token: Default::default()
146		}),
147		bounded_ty: {
148			let mut path = path!(::gotham_formdata::private::Value);
149			path.segments.last_mut().unwrap().arguments =
150				PathArguments::AngleBracketed(AngleBracketedGenericArguments {
151					colon2_token: None,
152					lt_token: Default::default(),
153					args: iter::once(GenericArgument::Lifetime(lt)).collect(),
154					gt_token: Default::default()
155				});
156			Type::Path(TypePath { qself: None, path })
157		},
158		colon_token: Default::default(),
159		bounds: iter::once(TypeParamBound::Trait(TraitBound {
160			paren_token: None,
161			modifier: TraitBoundModifier::None,
162			lifetimes: None,
163			path: {
164				let mut path = path!(::gotham_formdata::private::Parse);
165				path.segments.last_mut().unwrap().arguments =
166					PathArguments::AngleBracketed(AngleBracketedGenericArguments {
167						colon2_token: None,
168						lt_token: Default::default(),
169						args: iter::once(GenericArgument::Type(t)).collect(),
170						gt_token: Default::default()
171					});
172				path
173			}
174		}))
175		.collect()
176	})
177}
178
179#[cfg(test)]
180mod tests {
181	use super::*;
182
183	#[test]
184	fn test_where_predicate_t_send() {
185		let t = syn::parse_str("FooBar<'a, String, &'static [u8]>").unwrap();
186		let expected = quote! { FooBar<'a, String, &'static [u8]>: ::std::marker::Send };
187		let actual = where_predicate_t_send(t);
188		assert_eq!(syn::parse2::<WherePredicate>(expected).unwrap(), actual);
189	}
190
191	#[test]
192	fn test_where_predicate_value_parse_t() {
193		let t = syn::parse_str("FooBar<'a, String, &'static [u8]>").unwrap();
194		let expected = quote! {
195			for<'gotham_formdata_value> ::gotham_formdata::private::Value<'gotham_formdata_value>:
196				::gotham_formdata::private::Parse<FooBar<'a, String, &'static [u8]>>
197		};
198		let actual = where_predicate_value_parse_t(t);
199		assert_eq!(syn::parse2::<WherePredicate>(expected).unwrap(), actual);
200	}
201}
